titleStmt.title: The effect of certaine branches of the statute made in anno xxxiii. Henr. viii. touching the maintenance of artyllery and the punishment of such as vse vnlawfull games, very necessary to be put in execution.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,
